title: Peyton Manning's retirement & Free Agency preview
itunes:title: Peyton Manning's retirement & Free Agency preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler– are joined by Dave Dameshek as they recap Peyton Manning’s retirement press conference and look back at his legendary career. Then, the heroes preview the start of free agency with the latest addition of “Go Get My Lunch!”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
